name: Valyrian
body:
### Welcome to valyrian Generate cool and unique names with javascript ### How to use Document
The **generatesNames(time, sylMin, sylMax);** function can accept 3 arguments : * **times**: to set how many names you want. (Default: 10) * **sylMin**: set the minimum syllables in your names (Default: 2) * **sylMax**: set the maximum syllables in your names (Default: 3) ### Feel free to fork it !
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
